summary: Successfully fixed 4 ClaudeAPI property errors by resolving interface conflicts

problemAnalysis.rootCause: Two conflicting ClaudeAPI interfaces defined in different files
problemAnalysis.typeScriptBehavior: TypeScript preferred .ts file over .d.ts file causing wrong interface usage

changes: Renamed configuration interface from ClaudeAPI to ClaudeAPIConfig
Added correct ClaudeAPI interface with methods to missing-types.ts

bestPractices.separationOfConcerns: Configuration vs execution interfaces clearly separated
bestPractices.namingConventions: ClaudeAPIConfig for configuration, ClaudeAPI for execution
bestPractices.moduleResolution: Consolidated interface definitions in single .ts file
